data.title: Alberto Elena - The Cinema of Abbas Kiarostami
data.meta_description: Alberto Elena - The Cinema of Abbas Kiarostami - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The Cinema of Abbas Kiarostami was first published in its original Spanish version in 2002. The book was presented in the context of the major retrospective of Kiarostamis work organized by the Gijon 40th International Film Festival. It was the first - and belated - opportunity to talk with the director in a relaxed and appropriate setting.
